metadata.feature_description: Configure text editor type (Plain Text or Rich WYSIWYG) for content creation in Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Answers module to Plain Text editor

steps.action: Navigate to Community Settings and locate Enable WYSIWYG section
steps.expected: Enable WYSIWYG section visible with Answers checkbox checked (Rich mode)
steps.actual: Enable WYSIWYG section displayed with Answers checkbox checked

steps.expected: Answers checkbox becomes unchecked (Plain Text mode)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Answers module to Rich editor

steps.action: Check the Answers checkbox to enable Rich editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Discussions module to Plain Text editor

steps.expected: Discussions checkbox becomes unchecked (Plain Text mode)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Discussions module to Rich editor

steps.action: Check the Discussions checkbox to enable Rich editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Ideas module to Plain Text editor

steps.expected: Ideas checkbox becomes unchecked (Plain Text mode)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Ideas module to Rich editor

steps.action: Check the Ideas checkbox to enable Rich editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Social Events module to Plain Text editor

steps.expected: Social Events checkbox becomes unchecked (Plain Text mode)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set Social Events module to Rich editor

steps.action: Check the Social Events checkbox to enable Rich editor
steps.expected: Social Events checkbox becomes checked (Rich mode)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all editor settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Set mixed configuration: Answers=Rich, Discussions=Plain, Ideas=Plain, Social Events=Plain
Refresh page and reopen Community Settings
steps.actual: All settings persisted correctly - Answers=checked, Discussions=unchecked, Ideas=unchecked, Social Events=unchecked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default values (all Rich/1) for settings

steps.action: Observe initial state of Enable WYSIWYG checkboxes
steps.expected: All checkboxes should be checked (Rich editor as default)
steps.actual: Initial observation showed all 4 modules (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events) with Rich editor enabled (checked)

observations: The Enable WYSIWYG feature uses checkboxes where checked=Rich editor (value 1) and unchecked=Plain Text editor (value 0)
The UI correctly reflects the code structure from CmxSettings.cs which defines EditorChoice as Dictionary<string, int> with values 0=Plain Text, 1=Rich
All 4 modules (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events) are configurable as documented in the code
Settings persist correctly across page refreshes, indicating proper database storage
The Save button provides clear visual feedback with 'Item successfully saved' message
